name: Sushi
description: A dish of prepared vinegared rice, usually with some sugar and salt, accompanying a variety of ingredients, such as seafood, vegetables, and occasionally tropical fruits.

name: Ramen
description: A Japanese dish with Chinese-style wheat noodles served in a meat or fish-based broth, often flavored with soy sauce or miso, and topped with ingredients such as sliced pork, dried seaweed, and green onions.

name: Tempura
description: A Japanese dish of seafood or vegetables that have been battered and deep-fried until crispy.

name: Soba
description: A type of Japanese noodle made from buckwheat flour, often served chilled with a dipping sauce or in hot broth.

name: Okonomiyaki
description: A Japanese savory pancake made with a variety of ingredients, such as shredded cabbage, meats, seafood, and eggs, and topped with a sweet and savory sauce, mayonnaise, and dried seaweed.

name: Tonkatsu
description: A Japanese dish consisting of a breaded and deep-fried pork cutlet, often served with rice, miso soup, and shredded cabbage.
